comment: : Yet another disturbance , from within my darkest depths . A savage growl , echoed within these tiled walls . I sat poised for battle . The tension was palpable , and the sweat on my brow was that , of a light summer's rain . It was then , it showed itself !

comment: : As the demon tried to grab hold of me , I began to cast it out , muttering words to my savior for assistance . With each forceful pass , its fiery claws ripped away , until it lost it grip , and was vanquished to the sea .
